name: Blackguard Cruiser
description: This is not a ship for PVE, because every AI fleet has much void resist. It can cause many damage to several enemys with echo cannon type void with chain reaction in FvF.
obtaining: Events such as Alliance War and Void strike.
tips-builds: void resonnant armor; void shell; void ionization; void epsilon echo cannon;voltaic thruster;(whatever)
author: craftarkio ytb
